title: EATYOCHIEM. GOT A SPAM VIRUS ON MY LOL ACCOUNT * riot
body: I got a virus from a clickable link. i kno im an idiot. please fix it or email me riot. -snip--

replies.body: I've removed your email due to security reasons.  It's okay, you can still take this time to secure your info in and outside of League, and I recommend going over our[ account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to help.  Let me know if you run into any problems accessing your account.
